text.div:
English

Generated Narrative: CodeSystem CDSSelectionBehavior

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeTypeDescription
should-shallshould-shallbooleanCodes with this property true must have shall or should appended in the grammar
expressionexpressionstringExpression that expresses aggregate codes using the grammar

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tools/CodeSystem/CDSSelectionBehavior defines the following codes:

CodeDefinition
at-most-one indicates that the user may choose none or at most one of the suggestions
any indicates that the end user may choose any number of suggestions including none of them and all of them
